Name: Sub-space Structure: Suspended Pathway
Desc: An elevated boardwalk that can used to construct paths between floating platforms as well as taller buildings. These boardwalks seem to have been made from simple wooden boards and ropes, but each board actually has an appropriately-sized Liyue Plaustrite shard embedded inside of it.\nCompared to large Sub-Space Boulders, these boardwalks have limited load-bearing capacity. Therefore, please refrain from leaving heavy items on the boards for a long time, or running or jumping while on the boardwalk...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
